    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Energija, odposlana  skozi polarizator</string>
            <string language="en">Energy transmitted through polarizer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie übertragen durch Polarisator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie transmise par le polariseur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia transmitida através do polarizer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia trasmessa tramite il polarizzatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που διαβιβάζεται μέσω του πολωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía transmitida a través del polarizador</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">3D animacija električna polja linearno polariziranega svetlobnega valovanja pri prehodu skozi polarizator.</string>
            <string language="en">3D animation of linear polarized electric field of light when passing the polarizer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polarizator</string>
            <string language="en">polarizer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polarizacija</string>
            <string language="en">polarization</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Animation 3D von linearem polarisiertem 
elektrischem fangen vom Licht auf, wenn sie den Polarisator 
führt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animation 3D de champ électrique polarisé 
linéaire de lumière en passant le polariseur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animation 3D do campo elétrico polarizado linear 
da luz ao passar o polarizer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animazione 3D del campo elettrico polarizzato 
lineare di luce quando passano il polarizzatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρισδιάστατη το ζωτικότητα του γραμμικού πολωμένου 
ηλεκτρικού πεδίου του φωτός κατά διάβαση του πολωτή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">animación 3D del campo eléctrico polarizado 
linear de la luz al pasar el polarizador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polarisator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
